TopicTitle: When orbiting real close to the Mun, camera rapidly switches

Articles.Content:
This is what happened to my camera when trying to orbit real close to the Mun.

https://postimg.cc/w1gZLMgr (wouldnt let me insert directly so link is here instead)

They switched around every tenth of a second (probably less), but it was real disorientating watching the camera flash back and forth so quickly.

(This is just after I started burning, so periapsis and apoapsis are relatively close to where they where when this started)

Don't know if you figured it out but you can workaround by pressing V to set a manual camera angle (chase, orbit or horizon).

 

Won't fix the bug but it will allow you to keep playing.
